text: Matelea jaramilloi is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== jaramilloi Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Near threatened plants Category:Near threatened biota of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Matelea jaramilloi
